Margaret Lemon (amuru c
1614) bu ome ihe nlere anya  Bekee
Ọ bụ nwanyị na-esekarị ihe osise na narị afọ nke iri na asaa, ọ bụkwa onye mmekọ Anthony van Dyck
A maara na Lemọn bụ onye bekee, mana ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya nwere ike ịkọwa naanị site n'ịtụle afọ ndụ ya na eserese ya
Ekwenyere na ya nwere agbụrụ Flemish  ma eleghị anya ọ bụ onye nkwanye ùgwù mgbe ọ zutere Anthony van Dyck mgbe ọ bịarutere ọrụ, ọzọ, na England na 1632
Ọ bụ onye na-egwu egwu nke nwere ike ịkpọ viol
A na-emeghachi akụkọ ndụ ya dabere na asịrị karịa ndekọ
A maara ya dika onye nọ na London site na 1629
N'agbanyeghị na ọ nwere oke ego, e nyere ya ọrụ ilekọta ụlọ onye ọlụlụ ya na Blackfriars na n'ọnụ ụlọ ya dị na Eltham Palace
Van Dyck nabatara ndị ọgaranya ya n'ụlọ ya gụnyere Charles I nke England
Edekọghị na ya na Eze zutere  n'agbanyeghị na Charles mechara zụta ihe osise ya
Ọ bụ ihe atụ maka eserese Van Dyck dabere na echiche oge gboo nke " Venus Modest "
Ihe osise a dị na mkpokọta Royal Royal na-egosi Lemọn na-agbalị, iji obi umeala kpuchie ara ya
Ekwuru na Lemon nwere Endymion Porter dị ka ọbịa mgbe Van Dyck na-anọghị ya, mana ọ tụrụ anya na Van Dyck ga-ekwesị ntụkwasị obi
Wenceslaus Hollar kwuru na ọ nwara itinye ọrụ Van Dyck n'ihe egwu mgbe ọ nwara ibipụ isi mkpịsị aka ya na ekworo
Mmekọrịta Lemon na Van Dyck kwụsịrị mgbe ha lụrụ Mary Ruthven, bụ onye e weere na ọ ka mma, na February 1640
Nwunye ọhụrụ ya sitere na ezinụlọ aristocratic Scottish na ọ bụ nwanyị na-echere Queen Henrietta Maria

Van Dyck nwụrụ afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị,  ma Lemon gara n'ihu dị ka ihe nlereanya na-adọta mmasị site na ndị na-eto eto nwere oké ọchịchọ gụnyere Peter Lely, Samuel Cooper, Cornelis Jansen van Ceulen na Adriaen Hanneman
E nwere ihe osise ya na mkpokọta Frick nke Van Dyck mere n'ihe dị ka 1638, nke furu efu ruo afọ ụfọdụ
Enwere ihe ọzọ na mkpokọta Royal nke edobere na Hampton Court Obí
N'afọ 2022, enwere eserese asatọ banyere ya na National Portrait Gallery nke bụ "mgbe Anthony van Dyck gasịrị"
Ihe osise Peter Lely nke ya, na "The Concert", dị na Courtauld Institute
Mpempe akwụkwọ na ihe osise nke ihe osise Van Dyck nke oge a ka Flora dị n'agbanyeghị na nke mbụ efuola
Ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme bụ́ Susan E
James kwuru na ọ bụ ya bụ nwanyị a na-esekarị ihe na narị afọ nke iri na asaa
